capability.name: Syndicate Management
capability.definition: This Service Domain manages syndicate membership and compliance
capability.role: Manage the membership and administration of syndicates in compliance with the agreed syndicate charter and operating agreements. This combines the application of eligibility requirements to establish membership and the subsequent ensuring of compliance with performance obligations defined under the membership
capability.example: A major project funding initiative assembles a syndicate of investors

key_features.name: Overall membership maintenance and reporting
key_features.description: Enables overall membership maintenance and reporting to support this service domain manages syndicate membership and compliance

key_features.name: Individual membership enrolment
key_features.description: Enables individual membership enrolment to support this service domain manages syndicate membership and compliance

key_features.name: Apply eligibility clauses
key_features.description: Enables apply eligibility clauses to support this service domain manages syndicate membership and compliance

key_features.name: Enforce compliance obligations
key_features.description: Enables enforce compliance obligations to support this service domain manages syndicate membership and compliance
